text.autoconfig.raytracingsounds.title: Raytracing Sounds
Rollof Factor
Affects how quiet a sound gets based on distance.
Lower values mean distant sounds are louder.
1.0 is the physically correct value.
Global Volume Multiplier
The global volume multiplier made to sounds.
Global Reverb Gain
The global volume of simulated reverberations.
Global Reverb Brightness
The brightness of reverberation.
Higher values result in more high frequencies in reverberation.
Lower values give a more muffled sound to the reverb.
Sound Distance Allowance
Minecraft won't allow sounds to play past a certain distance.
This parameter is a multiplier for how far away a sound source
is allowed to be in order for it to actually play.
Values too high can cause polyphony issues.
Global Block Absortion
The global amount of sound that will be absorbed when traveling through blocks.
Global Block Reflectance
The global amount of sound reflectance energy of all blocks.
Lower values result in more conservative reverb simulation with shorter reverb tails.
Higher values result in more generous reverb simulation with higher reverb tails.
Air Absorption
A value controlling the amount that air absorbs high frequencies with distance.
A value of 1.0 is physically correct for air with normal humidity and temperature.
Higher values mean air will absorb more high frequencies with distance. 0 disables this effect.
Snow Air Absorption
The maximum air absorption factor when it's snowing.
The real absorption factor will depend on the snow's intensity.
Set to 1 or lower to disable
Underwater Filter
How much sound is filtered when the player is underwater.
0.0 means no filter. 1.0 means fully filtered.
Disable Noteblock
If true, note blocks will not be processed.
Max Ray Distance
How far the rays should be traced.
Doppler Enabled
REQUIRES RESTART. If true, the doppler effect will be enabled.
Skip Rain Occlusion Tracing
If true, rain sound sources won't trace for sound occlusion.
This can help performance during rain.
Environment Evaluation Rays
The number of rays to trace to determine reverberation for each sound source.
More rays provides more consistent tracing results but takes more time to calculate.
Decrease this value if you experience lag spikes when sounds play.
Simplet Shared Airspace Simulation
If true, enables a simpler technique for determining when the player and a sound source share airspace.
Might sometimes miss recognizing shared airspace, but it's faster to calculate.
Dynamic Environment Evaluation
WARNING it's implemented really badly so i'd recommend not always using it.
If true, the environment will keep getting evaluated for every sound that is currently playing.
This may affect performance
Dynamic Environment Evaluation Frequency
The frequency at witch to update environment of sounds if dynamic environment evaluation is enabled
Stone Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for stone blocks.
Wood Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for wooden blocks.
Ground Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for ground blocks (dirt, gravel, etc).
Plant Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for foliage blocks (leaves, grass, etc.).
Metal Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for metal blocks.
Glass Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for glass blocks.
Cloth Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for cloth blocks (carpet, wool, etc).
Sand Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for sand blocks.
Snow Reflectivity
Sound reflectivity for snow blocks.
Computronics Patching
REQUIRES RESTART. If true, patches the Computronics
sound sources so it works with Sound Physics.
Immersive Railroading Patching
REQUIRES RESTART. If true, patches the Immersive Railroading
sound sources so it works with Sound Physics.
Dynamic Surroundings Patching
REQUIRES RESTART. If true, patches Dynamic Surroundings
to fix some bugs with Sound Physics.
Auto Stereo Downmix
REQUIRES RESTART. If true, Automatically downmix
stereo sounds that are loaded to mono
Auto Stereo Downmix Logging
If true, Prints sound name and format of the sounds that get converted.
Show Debug Info
If true, Shows sources currently playing in the F3 debug info.
Injector Logging
If true, Logs debug info about the injector.
